body:
Hit me up on Discord if you want to do one, boldandbrash#4517.

What is your IGN and team?
Poofywoo and Celestial

How many tournaments have you participated in?
One. Conquest Inc, and some other unofficials.

Any team in particular you'd like to face off against?
To be honest i dont really have any team i would like to face off against, but i wanna see how Cacalmarin play.

Any team you don't want to face off against?
Puredogs and allah

How do you think you'll do this time around?
I think Celestial will do alright this time round. We have a strong roster, and are starting to improve. Last tm it was because of inactive players, but hopefully we'll have a better turn out this time.

Any teams you have a rivalry with?
We don't really have a rivalry this time around. Personally i wanna play SquadCatt

What do you think is your team's best strength, and your best strength alone?
We have a strong roster, like people know what to do. We work well as a team. My strength is that I work well with others. (mostly)

What do you think is your team's worst weakness, and your worst weakness alone?
Our weakness is that our communication is trash, my weakness is thatI i panic under pressure.

What have you done to prepare?
We have discussed team skins cause that's how teams win. Nah just scrimming lots with the tm roster. Working on strats.

Anything you'd like to say to your opponents?
Opponents, go to Mongul's wool first.

title: Race to Victory 2 Spotlight #3 - poofywoo

replies.body: Go to Mongul's wool, it's easier to get into his wool than mine
